company_name: Foshan Pengxin Electronic Technology Co., Ltd.
description_en: Foshan Pengxin Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. is a dedicated Electronic Manufacturing Services (EMS) provider operating from a modern facility in the CIFI Smart Manufacturing Centre, Foshan. The company integrates advanced production technology with a comprehensive one-stop processing model to deliver high-precision electronic assemblies. Its core capabilities are built around automated surface-mount technology (SMT) lines, lead-free soldering processes, and rigorous automated optical inspection (AOI), ensuring consistent product quality. Foshan Pengxin's electronic products and manufacturing services support diverse, technology-driven markets including industrial automation, medical devices, security and access control systems, biometrics (face recognition), public broadcasting, and entertainment gaming equipment.

offerings.name: Industrial PC Board
